backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor implementing chat, user profiles, video learning, exchange rates, and market trends with access control, HTTP outcalls, and periodic data updates.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four implemented features: tabbed chat interface, video learning fixes, real-time market updates, and exchange rate table integration.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files including components, pages, hooks, and configuration with focus on performance optimizations and feature implementations.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for JengaBiz Assistant application with root div and module script reference to main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component configuring QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, ThemeProvider, and Toaster for global application state and UI.
frontend/src/components/AnimatedBackgrou: Performance-optimized canvas-based animated gradient background with device capability detection, adaptive frame rates (30/60 FPS), reduced layer counts on low-end devices, and reduced motion support.
frontend/src/components/ChatMessage.tsx: Memoized chat message component with custom comparison function to prevent unnecessary re-renders, displaying user/AI messages with glass-morphic styling and staggered animations.
frontend/src/components/ExchangeRateTabl: Memoized component displaying exchange rates in two tables (KES to foreign and vice versa) with loading states, formatted timestamps, and glass-morphic styling using React Query hooks.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component with multi-channel communication options (WhatsApp and USSD) for contacting JengaBiz support. Includes authentication checks, USSD availability status monitoring, and displays copyright information with app identifier.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header component displaying the JengaBiz logo, theme toggle (light/dark mode), and user dropdown menu with profile name and logout functionality. Uses Internet Identity authentication and React Query for user profile data.
frontend/src/components/LoginModal.tsx: Modal dialog for user authentication via Internet Identity. Displays JengaBiz branding and a sign-in button with loading state, preventing dismissal until login is complete.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for first-time user profile creation, prompting for the user's name. Prevents dismissal and uses mutation hook to save profile data with success/error toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/WelcomeScreen.ts: Landing page component showcasing JengaBiz's mission, vision, and motivation with animated cards. Includes hero section with logo and detailed about section explaining the AI-powered business advisory platform for Kenyan SMEs.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state. Automatically invalidates and refetches dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout flow, identity persistence, and authentication status. Configures AuthClient with custom options including derivation origin and idle behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, video categories, videos by category, market data, and exchange rates. Includes a large curated list of TED talk videos organized by business-related categories.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for a bright entrepreneurship-themed design system including light/dark modes, glassmorphism effects, and custom scrollbar styling.
frontend/src/lib/aiResponses.ts: AI response generator that detects language (English/Swahili) and provides contextual business advice using keyword-based templates for topics like budgeting, pricing, marketing, and business planning.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: About page component showcasing JengaBiz mission, vision, impact areas, and value propositions with animated cards and statistics for entrepreneur empowerment.
frontend/src/pages/ChatPage.tsx: Chat interface component with message history, localStorage persistence, tabbed view for current/history conversations, auto-scrolling, and AI response generation with debounced input handling.
frontend/src/pages/MainApp.tsx: Main application container component that manages authentication state, tab navigation (chat, market, videos, about), and conditionally displays login/profile setup modals. Includes a persistent floating AI assistant button that navigates to the chat tab.
frontend/src/pages/MarketAnalysisPage.ts: Market analysis dashboard displaying mock trend and sector data with recharts visualizations, exchange rate table, and auto-refresh functionality (5-minute intervals). Includes manual refresh controls and relative timestamp display.
frontend/src/pages/VideoLearningPage.tsx: Video learning page that displays curated TED/YouTube videos with thumbnail lazy loading, pagination (12 per page), category filtering, and a dialog player. Uses memoized VideoCard components to optimize rendering performance.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom color scheme using OKLCH color space, extended theme with custom animations (accordion, shimmer), border radius variables, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state tracking document listing implemented features including performance optimizations (virtualization, memoization, lazy loading), tabbed chat interface, floating AI button, market data auto-refresh, and video page fixes. Marks this as a fix request for app hanging/performance issues.
